title: After More Than 400 Days In Egyptian Jail, Journalists Released â€” For Now
teaser: An Egyptian court released Al-Jazeera journalists Baher Mohamed and Mohamed Fahmy on bail, but their case hasn't been dismissed. For more details, David Greene speaks with NPR's Leila Fadel in Cairo.
